content: **you ll love this beautifully textured washcloth pattern beautiful and quick to make ** try the pebble beach washcloth/dishcloth pattern this pattern is beginner-friendly and works up quickly use neutral yarn or choose a bright color for more pizzaz **pattern highlights** // written & video instructions included **sizes** 8 x 8 with instructions to increase the size **suggested yarn** hobby lobby i love this cotton and paintbox cotton aran **hooks used** i 9/5 5
